Property.name: file_name
Property.Description: Provide name of the package file. File extension should be nupkg. E.g. AWI.nupkg

Property.name: processname
Property.Description: Provide the unique identifier of the process to be associated with the environment. E.g. AWI

Property.name: processversion
Property.Description: Provide the version of the process.

Property.name: input_arguments
Property.Description: Provide input arguments in key=value pairs separated by comma. E.g. key1=value1,key2=value2

Property.name: /uipath/restapiurl
Property.Description: Provide URL of the UiPath REST API. E.g. https://platform.uipath.com

Property.name: /uipath/tenantname
Property.Description: Provide tenant name to generate the token for authentication. E.g. admin.

Property.name: /uipath/username
Property.Description: Provide username for the REST API authentication. E.g. automic

Property.name: /uipath/password
Property.Description: Provide password for the REST API authentication.

Property.name: /uipath/robotname
Property.Description: Provide the name of the robot.

Property.name: /source/source_files_dirs
Property.Description: Remote file/directory to be downloaded.

Property.name: /target/target_files_dirs
Property.Description: Name of a local file/directory where downloaded file/directory is stored.

Property.name: /target/filepath
Property.Description: Path of file to be uploaded

Property.name: /target/overwrite_target
Property.Description: Overwrite local files/directory if exist.

Property.name: /staging/working_files_dirs
Property.Description: Files/Directory on the staging server after downloaded from source.

Property.name: /staging/agent
Property.Description: Agent which will be used for staging

Property.name: /staging/working_base_dir
Property.Description: Base directory on the staging server where package should be downloaded to.
